title: Minister’s Group Life Plan
html:
Home » Services » Insurance » Minister’s Group Life Plan

Minister’s Group Life Plan

AGFinancial Insurance administers the group term life plan for the General Council of the Assemblies of God. The group life plan, also known as the minister’s plan, has been in force for over 60 years and is available to anyone who holds credentials with the Assemblies of God. It is provided through our group carrier, The Standard Insurance Company.

What the AG Minister’s Plan offers…

For ministers enrolled before March 1, 2005(PDF)

For ministers enrolled after March 1, 2005(PDF)

For missionaries or ministers living overseas(PDF)

Enroll in the Ministers or Missionary Life Insurance Plans

1. Download and complete the appropriate form.

MINISTER Life Insurance Plan(PDF)

MISSIONARY Life Insurance Plan(PDF)

2. If applicable, complete the state-specific medical history form.

Medical history form(PDF).

3. Complete the Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT) form

EFT Form(PDF)

4. Fax or Mail the completed forms

AGFinancial Insurance

PO Box 10263
Springfield MO 65808-0263

Fax: 417.447.7475

Are you a client in need of support?

For those currently enrolled in the Group Term Life Plan and needing support, please review the helpful links below.

Beneficiary Form

Change of Address Form

Standard Life Certificates

CREDENTIALED MINISTERS ENROLLED BEFORE MARCH 1, 2005, POLICY #646522-A

CREDENTIALED MINISTERS ENROLLED AFTER MARCH 1, 2005, POLICY #646527-A

CREDENTIALED MISSIONARIES OR MINISTERS LIVING OVERSEAS, POLICY #646524

NOT CREDENTIALED, BUT WORK FOR AN AG CHURCH OR ENTITY AND ENROLLED BEFORE MARCH 1, 2005, POLICY #646522-B (POLICY NO LONGER OFFERED)

NOT CREDENTIALED, BUT WORK FOR AN AG CHURCH OR ENTITY AND ENROLLED FROM MARCH 1, 2005 TO JANUARY 1, 2009, POLICY #646527-B (POLICY NO LONGER OFFERED)

For more information or details about any of these policies, please contact us at 800.447.0446 or by email.

Assist America, Inc. (Travel Assistance)

Assist America is an extra benefit, available at no additional cost to those who are insured in The Standard group term life insurance. This benefit allows the insured member and their family to have access to all kinds of trip services when traveling more than 100 miles from home.

Benefits Overview – English

Program Description – English

Benefits Overview – Spanish

Program Description – Spanish

Life Services Tool Kit

The Life Services Toolkit is an extra benefit, available at no additional cost to those who are insured in The Standard group term life insurance. This benefit is available at the time of the loss of a loved one.
